55.eng-name: The Book of Zuhd and Softening of Hearts

hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:The servant speaks words that he does not understand its repercussions but he sinks down in Hell-Fire farther than the distance between the east and the west

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّكَلُّمِ بِالْكَلِمَةِ يَهْوِي بِهَا فِي النَّارِ
